```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Amazing Building



```{r echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  setView(lng = 6.958281, lat = 50.941278, zoom = 20) # Koelner Dom
```
